metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9378 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Ettercap 0.8.1 does not validate certain return values, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly executearbitrary code via a crafted (1) name to the parse_line function inmdns_spoof/mdns_spoof.c or (2) base64 encoded password to thedissector_imap function in dissectors/ec_imap.c.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
